item.description:
We'll ask for a slight donation ($2 to $3) to cover costs.

Just edited time to read 6:30 PM. 

Look forward to seeing everyone tonight! (Wed. Mar. 2nd)

 

Caryn
item.how_to_find_us: We'll send the address if you don't already have it, it's in Scarborough.
item.why: We'll watch a clip from an inspiring movie and discuss. Also, further our discussions about organizing our thoughts so we don't feel so stressed and manifesting what we desire.
item.name: Let's meet again on March 2nd and continue our great discussions!
